1.2 About this Document

 

The SAW User Guide references and utilizes several icons that are present in the application and icons utilized in the instructions.  To assist you in becoming familiar the following is the list of those present in the SAW application (refer to Table 2  ICONS and Symbols in SAW) and those frequently used as instruction throughout the user guide (refer to Table 3  ICONS within the User Guide):

 

Table 2 Icons and Symbols in SAW

Icon

Description

‘Account Settings’ icon, located in the upper right corner of the screen. Varies in the letter and color depending on the user.

‘Menu’ icon, click to open a menu of links that are available to access.

‘Edit’ icon. Populates a screen to edit information.

 

Table 3 Icons Used in Online Help
Icon Description
Important information. Stop and read this is to bring something to your attention.
Instructions
Information that is available for your reference
A note is written for emphasis
Additional accompaniments to this document
The area of the document is still awaiting additional information and is therefore still under construction
Step number from instructions.
